resources.string: Without this permission the app is unable to add photo from your device camera. Are you sure you want to deny this permission?
To allow camera access, please enable permission in settings.
Without this permission the app is unable to access photos on your device. Are you sure you want to deny this permission?
To allow photo access, please enable permission in settings.
Without this permission the app is unable to get your location. Are you sure you want to deny this permission?
To allow location access, please enable permission in settings.
Without this permission the app is unable to to get your location. Are you sure you want to deny this permission?
